about_the_game:
The Prologue of Universe for Sale, in this demo you will get a taste of what will be in the final game, which is currently in development.

Live a sci-fi narrative experience about human relationships and self-acceptance, follow the stories of the nameless Master, a mysterious cultist and Lila the universes vendor.
Walk through Jupiter's roads, meet absurd characters with incredible stories to tell, and craft your own stories with Lila's power to create custom universes.

Features:

• Immerse yourself through a picturesque, full hand-drawn world, highly inspired by the European's sci-fi comics.



• Discover the past of mysterious characters and religions to achieve enlightenment.



• Relax with an original soundtrack.



• Create personalized universes in a chill-out atmosphere.
detailed_description:
BUY THE FULL GAME!!


About the Game

The Prologue of Universe for Sale, in this demo you will get a taste of what will be in the final game, which is currently in development.

Live a sci-fi narrative experience about human relationships and self-acceptance, follow the stories of the nameless Master, a mysterious cultist and Lila the universes vendor.
Walk through Jupiter's roads, meet absurd characters with incredible stories to tell, and craft your own stories with Lila's power to create custom universes.

Features:

• Immerse yourself through a picturesque, full hand-drawn world, highly inspired by the European's sci-fi comics.



• Discover the past of mysterious characters and religions to achieve enlightenment.



• Relax with an original soundtrack.



• Create personalized universes in a chill-out atmosphere.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS
  • Processor: Pentium 4
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Chipset 3000
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS
  • Processor: Pentium 4
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.14 or lower
  • Processor: Intel Core i-5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Pro 1536mb
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.14 or lower
  • Processor: Intel Core i-7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon Pro 5300M
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Universe For Sale - Prologue

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i-3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any Graphics card with more than 2GB of Storage Space.
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i-5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any Graphics card with more than 4GB of Storage Space.
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: The Prologue of Universe for Sale, a sci-fi narrative experience about human relationships and self-acceptance, follow the stories of the nameless Master, a mysterious cultist and Lila the universes vendor.
